attributes.action: Create legislation that requires drivers to take a refresher driving course every 15 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that legislation needs to be created that requires drivers to take a refresher driving course every 15 years. Unfortunately the laws, regulations and signs on the roads change frequently, and drivers that passed more than 15 years ago are not aware of new rules and regulations and need to be brought up to speed to ensure road safety and cut down on needless accidents.
